description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF 1 DOUBLE GARAGE AND 1 SINGLE GARAGE TO THE REAR OF 17  & 17A RIDGE ROAD.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development is permitted under Class E comprising a single garage to the rear of and within the curtilage of 17 Ridge Road and  the development is permitted under Class E comprising a single garage to the rear of and within the curtilage of 17A Ridge Road. The operations would consist of the enlargement of the respective dwelling houses within the meaning of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class E. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - INFORMATIVE The hardstanding areas shown on the approved plans shall be constructed from permeable materials.  Advice regarding permeable and porous hardstandings can be found in the document 'Guidance on the Permeable Surfacing of Front Gardens' available at http://www.communities.gov.uk/publications/planningandbuilding/pavingfrontgardens

Condition : 3 - INFORMATIVE: The use of each garage must be incidental to the residential enjoyment of the relevant dwelling house (17 or 17A Ridge Road) of which it forms part of the curtilage. Use for any other purpose, including use in association with the other dwelling may invalidate this certificate and require planning permission.
